name: Pre-K
description: Pre-K (Ages 4 & 5) offering full-time and half-day scheduling options, five days per week. - Morning Care: 8:30 a.m. – 9:00 a.m. - Pre-Kindergarten Half Day Program: 9:00 a.m. – 1:30 p.m. - Pre-Kindergarten Full Day Program: 9:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m. - Nap/Rest time: 2:30-3:30 p.m. (adjustable according to each child’s needs)
fullDescription: Pre-K (Ages 4 & 5) offering full-time and half-day scheduling options, five days per week. - Morning Care: 8:30 a.m. – 9:00 a.m. - Pre-Kindergarten Half Day Program: 9:00 a.m. – 1:30 p.m. - Pre-Kindergarten Full Day Program: 9:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m. - Nap/Rest time: 2:30-3:30 p.m. (adjustable according to each child’s needs)
whatTheyOffer: Pre-K (Ages 4 & 5) offering full-time and half-day scheduling options, five days per week. - Morning Care: 8:30 a.m. – 9:00 a.m. - Pre-Kindergarten Half Day Program: 9:00 a.m. – 1:30 p.m. - Pre-Kindergarten Full Day Program: 9:00 a.m. – 5:30 p.m. - Nap/Rest time: 2:30-3:30 p.m. (adjustable according to each child’s needs)
howToGetIt: To begin the application process, please sign up for the individual tours which are given throughout the year. During the tours, families may pick up information packets. You can find the handbook for more information and sign-up form to schedule a tour. Congregation Beth Sholom members receive priority for admission at CBS Family Preschool. Families will be informed of their enrollment status and must return their financial agreement in order to reserve a space for their child for the following school year.
cost: Varies: Eligible families can qualify for a tuition credit through the Early Learning for All Tuition Credit. (Families who meet the income criteria 150% of the Area Median Income (AMI) or below and are San Francisco residents may qualify).
